testsuite.name: Authentication Process
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Authentication Process As a registered member in the system I want to have access to all of its internal features, which are only accessible after a successful login procedure
--Output from -- #Issue#73 - Informar erro ao submeter username inexistente, na tela de Login Scenario: # Authentication.feature:7 Given I am at the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:45 When I try to login with an user that does not exist # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:72 Then I am redirected to the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:32 And A login failure message is displayed # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:78
--Output from -- #Issue#66 - Informar erro ao submeter usuário com senha inválida, na tela de Login Scenario: # Authentication.feature:15 Given I am at the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:45 ENTROU no signIn Enabled == true When I try to login with an existent user, though with wrong password # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:75 Then I am redirected to the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:32 And A login failure message is displayed # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:78
--Output from -- #Issue#63 - Informar quando um usuário é cadastrado com sucesso Scenario: # Authentication.feature:23 ENTROU no registerparams NULL Given I am at the User Register Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:49 user: null validate: null errors: null ENTROU no register When I register a user with success # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:83 And I am redirected to the User Register Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:35 Then A message indicating the user was successfully registered is displayed # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:86
--Output from -- #Issue#69 - Informar quando tentar cadastrar novo usuário com e-mail inválido Scenario: # Authentication.feature:31 Given I am at the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:45 ENTROU no registerparams NULL When I try to create a "newuser" username with the "invalid email abcde" email # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:106 ENTROU no registergrails.validation.ValidationErrors: 1 errors Field error in object 'rgms.member.Member' on field 'email': rejected value [invalid email abcde]; codes [rgms.member.Member.email.email.error.rgms.member.Member.email,rgms.member.Member.email.email.error.email,rgms.member.Member.email.email.error.java.lang.String,rgms.member.Member.email.email.error,member.email.email.error.rgms.member.Member.email,member.email.email.error.email,member.email.email.error.java.lang.String,member.email.email.error,rgms.member.Member.email.email.invalid.rgms.member.Member.email,rgms.member.Member.email.email.invalid.email,rgms.member.Member.email.email.invalid.java.lang.String,rgms.member.Member.email.email.invalid,member.email.email.invalid.rgms.member.Member.email,member.email.email.invalid.email,member.email.email.invalid.java.lang.String,member.email.email.invalid,email.invalid.rgms.member.Member.email,email.invalid.email,email.invalid.java.lang.String,email.invalid]; arguments [email,class rgms.member.Member,invalid email abcde]; default message [O campo [{0}] da classe [{1}] com o valor [{2}] não é um endereço de email válido.] Then A message indicating the email is invalid is displayed # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:118
--Output from -- #Issue#67 - Durante o login, ao errar o password de um usuário existente, cuja conta ainda não foi liberada pelo #administrador, redirecionar à Tela de login e exibir uma mensagem de 'usuário ou senha inválida' Scenario: # Authentication.feature:39 Given I am at the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:45 And The user of "naoHabilitado" username is not yet enabled # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:91 ENTROU no signIn Enabled == false When I miss the password for "naoHabilitado" username # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:101 Then I am redirected to the Login Page # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:32 And A login failure message is displayed # AuthenticationSteps.groovy:78
